# mattermost_slash_command (Resource)

Manages a Mattermost slash command.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `display_name` (String) Display name for the slash command.
- `team_id` (String) The team ID where this command will be available.
- `trigger` (String) The trigger word for the slash command (without the leading slash).
- `url` (String) The URL that the command will make a request to.

### Optional

- `auto_complete` (Boolean) Whether the command shows up in autocomplete.
- `auto_complete_desc` (String) Description for autocomplete.
- `auto_complete_hint` (String) Hint for autocomplete arguments.
- `description` (String) Description of the slash command.
- `icon_url` (String) The profile picture that responses will use.
- `method` (String) The HTTP method for the request (P for POST, G for GET).
- `username` (String) The username that responses will post as.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
